# RetroAuto v2 Documentation (The Encyclopedia v5.0)

> **Description:** Comprehensive documentation for RetroAuto v2, split into logical manuals.

## ðŸ“š Core Reading Path (v5.0)

1. **[Start Here](user_guide/01_start.md)** - Setup, Prerequisites.
2. **[Visual IDE Manual](user_guide/02_ide_visual.md)** - Assets, Actions, Properties Panels.
3. **[Code & Debug Manual](user_guide/03_ide_code.md)** - Code Editor, **Debugger**, Breakpoints.
4. **[Core Concepts](user_guide/04_concepts.md)** - Execution Model, Interrupts, Vision.
5. **[The Cookbook](user_guide/05_cookbook.md)** - Recipes (Login, Farming).
6. **[Troubleshooting](user_guide/06_troubleshooting.md)** - Diagnostic Trees.
7. **[Reference Manual](user_guide/07_reference.md)** - Full API Dictionary.
